com.tikal.jenkins.plugins.multijob.Multi.description: WARNING: THIS IS AN AUTO-GENERATED JOB DEFINITION. CHANGES MADE USING THE ONLINE EDITOR WILL NOT BE HONORED. MAKE CHANGES TO THE JOB DEFINITIONS IN THE openshift/aos-cd-jobs REPOSITORY INSTEAD.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AOS_CD_JOBS_TARGET_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the aos-cd-jobs repository to test against.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_TARGET_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the openshift-ansible repository to test against.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull-request in the openshift-ansible repository to test.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ORIGIN_TARGET_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the origin repository to test against.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi latest="$( readlink "${HOME}/origin-ci-tool/latest" )" touch "${latest}" cp "${latest}/bin/activate" "${WORKSPACE}/activate" cat >> "${WORKSPACE}/activate" <<EOF export OCT_CONFIG_HOME="${WORKSPACE}/.config" EOF
source "${WORKSPACE}/activate" mkdir -p "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}" rm -rf "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}/origin-ci-tool" oct configure ansible-client verbosity 2 oct configure aws-client 'keypair_name' 'libra' oct configure aws-client 'private_key_path' '/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/devenv.pem'

hudson.plugins.descriptionsetter.Descrip.description:
Using the aos-cd-jobs ${AOS_CD_JOBS_TARGET_BRANCH} branch.
Using PR ${OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_PULL_ID} merged into the openshift-ansible ${OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_TARGET_BRANCH} branch.
Using the origin ${ORIGIN_TARGET_BRANCH} branch.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: LOG SYSTEM INFORMATION ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: LOG SYSTEM INFORMATION ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" go version docker version EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: USE A RAMDISK FOR ETCD ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: USE A RAMDISK FOR ETCD ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" sudo mkdir -p /tmp sudo mount -t tmpfs -o size=2048m tmpfs /tmp sudo restorecon -R /tmp EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: INSTALL ORIGIN GA AND UPDATE ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: INSTALL ORIGIN GA AND UPDATE ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/aos-cd-jobs" pkg_name="origin" sudo yum install -y ansible-2.2.0.0 git checkout sjb general_yml_file=inventory/group_vars/OSEv3/general.yml if [ \$pkg_name = "atomic-openshift" ] then sed -i "s/deployment_type:.*/deployment_type: \"openshift-enterprise\" /g" \$general_yml_file fi openshift_pkgs=( \$pkg_name openshift-ansible-playbooks ) for pkg in "\${openshift_pkgs[@]}" do sudo python hack/get_available_pkgs.py \$pkg > "all_\${pkg}_versions" sed -i '/^[a-zA-Z]/d' all_\${pkg}_versions sort -u -o all_\${pkg}_versions all_\${pkg}_versions cat all_\${pkg}_versions done current_openshift_version=\$(tail -n1 all_\${pkg_name}_versions | awk -F'-' '{print \$1}') echo "current version -> \$current_openshift_version" current_openshift_major_version=\$(echo \$current_openshift_version | awk -F'.' '{print \$1}') current_openshift_minor_version=\$(echo \$current_openshift_version | awk -F'.' '{print \$2}') latest_version=\$current_openshift_major_version.\$((\$current_openshift_minor_version + 1)) all_current_openshift_versions_array=(\$(cat "all_\${pkg_name}_versions" | grep "\$current_openshift_major_version.\$current_openshift_minor_version")) all_current_openshift_ansible_versions_array=(\$(cat "all_openshift-ansible-playbooks_versions" | grep "^3.\$current_openshift_minor_version")) set_openshift_version=\$(echo \${all_current_openshift_versions_array[0]} | awk -F'-' '{print \$1}') echo "=== Installing openshift-ansible-\${all_current_openshift_ansible_versions_array[0]} ===" sudo yum install -y openshift-ansible-playbooks-\${all_current_openshift_ansible_versions_array[0]} echo "=== Installing \${pkg_name}-\${set_openshift_version} ===" ansible-playbook --become --become-user root --connection local -i inventory/ /usr/share/ansible/openshift-ansible/playbooks/byo/openshift-node/network_manager.yml ansible-playbook --become --become-user root --connection local -i inventory/ /usr/share/ansible/openshift-ansible/playbooks/byo/config.yml -e set_openshift_version="\${set_openshift_version}" if [ \${#all_current_openshift_versions_array[@]} -gt 1 ] then echo "=== Updating openshift-ansible to openshift-ansible-\${all_current_openshift_ansible_versions_array[\${#all_current_openshift_ansible_versions_array[@]}-1]} ===" sudo yum erase -y openshift-ansible sudo yum install -y openshift-ansible-playbooks-\${all_current_openshift_ansible_versions_array[\${#all_current_openshift_ansible_versions_array[@]}-1]} echo "=== Updating \${pkg_name} to \${pkg_name}-\${all_current_openshift_versions_array[\${#all_current_openshift_versions_array[@]}-1]} ===" ansible-playbook --become --become-user root --connection local --inventory inventory/ /usr/share/ansible/openshift-ansible/playbooks/byo/openshift-cluster/upgrades/v3_\${current_openshift_minor_version}/upgrade.yml -e openshift_upgrade_target="\${all_current_openshift_versions_array[\${#all_current_openshift_versions_array[@]}-1]}" fi EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD AN ORIGIN RELEASE ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD AN ORIGIN RELEASE ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/origin" hack/build-base-images.sh OS_BUILD_ENV_PRESERVE=_output/local hack/env OS_ONLY_BUILD_PLATFORMS='linux/amd64' hack/build-rpm-release.sh sudo systemctl restart docker hack/build-images.sh sed -i 's|go/src|data/src|' _output/local/releases/rpms/origin-local-release.repo sudo cp _output/local/releases/rpms/origin-local-release.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/ EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD AN OPENSHIFT-ANSIBLE RELEASE ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD AN OPENSHIFT-ANSIBLE RELEASE ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/openshift-ansible" tito_tmp_dir="tito" mkdir -p "\${tito_tmp_dir}" tito tag --offline --use-version 3.6.0 --accept-auto-changelog tito build --output="\${tito_tmp_dir}" --rpm --test --offline --quiet createrepo "\${tito_tmp_dir}/noarch" cat << EOR > ./openshift-ansible-local-release.repo [openshift-ansible-local-release] baseurl = file://\$( pwd )/\${tito_tmp_dir}/noarch gpgcheck = 0 name = OpenShift Ansible Release from Local Source EOR sudo cp ./openshift-ansible-local-release.repo /etc/yum.repos.d EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: UPDATE ORIGIN ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: UPDATE ORIGIN ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/aos-cd-jobs" sudo python hack/get_available_pkgs.py origin > "all_origin_versions" sed -i '/^[a-zA-Z]/d' all_origin_versions sort -u -o all_origin_versions all_origin_versions upgrade_version=\$(tail -1 all_origin_versions) upgrade_minor_version=\$(echo "\${upgrade_version}" | awk -F'.' '{print \$2}') ansible-playbook --become --become-user root --connection local --inventory inventory/ /usr/share/ansible/openshift-ansible/playbooks/byo/openshift-cluster/upgrades/v3_\${upgrade_minor_version}/upgrade.yml -e openshift_image_tag="\$( cat ./ORIGIN_COMMIT )" -e openshift_upgrade_target="\${upgrade_version}" EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: EXPOSE THE KUBECONFIG ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: EXPOSE THE KUBECONFIG ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" sudo chmod a+x /etc/ /etc/origin/ /etc/origin/master/ sudo chmod a+rw /etc/origin/master/admin.kubeconfig EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: DOWNLOAD ARTIFACTS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: DOWNLOAD ARTIFACTS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ARTIFACT_DIR="$( pwd )/artifacts" rm -rf "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" mkdir "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" if ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo stat /tmp/openshift; then ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo chmod -R o+rX /tmp/openshift scp -r -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel:/tmp/openshift "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" fi

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: GENERATE ARTIFACTS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: GENERATE ARTIFACTS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ARTIFACT_DIR="$( pwd )/artifacts/generated" rm -rf "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" mkdir "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo yum list installed >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/installed_packages.log" || true ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo ausearch -m avc >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/avc_denials.log" || true

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: FETCH SYSTEMD JOURNALS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: FETCH SYSTEMD JOURNALS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ARTIFACT_DIR="$( pwd )/artifacts/journals" rm -rf "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" mkdir "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo journalctl --unit docker.service --no-pager --all --lines=all >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/docker.service" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo journalctl --unit origin-master.service --no-pager --all --lines=all >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/origin-master.service" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo journalctl --unit origin-node.service --no-pager --all --lines=all >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/origin-node.service"
